component.name: getListsList
component.description: Returns all lists the authenticating or specified user subscribes to, including their own. The user is specified using the user_id or screen_name parameters. If no user is given, the authenticating user is used.

component.name: getListsMemberships
component.description: Returns the lists the specified user has been added to. If user_id or screen_name are not provided the memberships for the authenticating user are returned.

component.name: createLists
component.description: Creates a new list for the authenticated user.

component.name: getListsOwnerships
component.description: Get the lists owned by the specified Twitter user.
